import CartWidget from 'components/CartWidget' import { ThemeContext } from 'context/ThemeProvider' import { useContext } from 'react' import { Link, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' const NavBar = ({ session }) => { const context = useContext(ThemeContext) return ( <>
E-COMMERCE {' '} {session?.name}
    `px-2 py-1 rounded-md ${isActive ? ' bg-indigo-700 text-white' : 'hover:bg-indigo-100'} `} >Products `px-2 py-1 rounded-md ${isActive ? ' bg-indigo-700 text-white' : 'hover:bg-indigo-100'} `} >My orders
) } export default NavBar
